nodes.text: Nex was a pilot who flew an RZ-1 A-wing interceptor in Riot Squadron, a squadron that served the Rebel Alliance, and later, the New Republic. While serving Riot Squadron, the pilot was eventually killed. During the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing's attack on the frigate Hellion's Dare, several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, fellow pilot Wyl Lark remembered the names of Riot Squadron's deceased, including Nex.
Nex was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
